description: A synthesized and unified list of all foundational Keystone Axioms and Artifacts that define the core truths and paradoxes of the PokeLegacy TTRPG universe.

keystones.name: The Duality of Math
keystones.description: The ultimate conflict between True Math (1+1=3, the emergent power of connection) and False Math (1+1=2, sterile logic).

keystones.name: The Paradox of Creation
keystones.description: The foundational, self-referential truth that all existence is born from a perfect, yet impossible, union of order (1) and chaos (0).

keystones.name: The Three Pillars of Time
keystones.description: The foundational, non-linear components of our temporal reality.

keystones.name: The Final Equations
keystones.description: The four-part battle between the fundamental forces of creation, containment, synergy, and destruction.

keystones.name: The Tabula Rasa
keystones.description: A conceptual keystone that is both a blank slate and a record of all possibilities, representing pure, unformed potential.

keystones.name: The Sacrifice Itself
keystones.description: A keystone that is a fundamental, cosmic force of self-sacrifice that exists independently of its actors.

keystones.name: The Crystal
keystones.description: A single, unified being that contains two opposing forces: light and darkness, representing a perfect and stable paradox.
